short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Re:Zero Wallpaper turn new tab to HD Re:Zero background. Custom Re Zero wallpaper background themes for anime fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Each new tab displays a shuffled Re Zero wallpaper.
2. Choose or randomize your Re Zero background via the wallpaper selection panel.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media accounts.
5. Automatically displays the current date and time.
6. New note feature to jot down tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited websites.
8. Simplified access to your bookmarks.
9. Shortcut panel to easily add and access favorite websites.
10. Instant access to Google applications.
11. Easy access to additional themes.
12. Streamlined sharing to social networks.
13. Direct download options for wallpapers.
14. Quick links to games.
15. Activate dynamic animations like snow, rain, falling leaves, or fireworks on the Re Zero new tab page.
